英文法規名稱: Standard rates for National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts Library Card Applications
中文法規名稱: 國立臺灣美術館資料中心閱覽證收費標準

法規內容.條文內容: The Standards are decreed in accordance with the Charges and Fees Act stated in Article 10,Paragraph 1.
An application fee of NT$50 would be charged by National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts library.
The Standards are executed since the date of promulgation.
